text: The 2003 Grand Prix SAR La Princesse Lalla Meryem was a women's tennis tournament played on outdoor clay courts in Casablanca, Morocco that was part of the Tier V category of the 2003 WTA Tour. It was the third edition of the tournament and was held from 31 March until 6 April 2003. Second-seeded Rita Grande won the singles title and earned $16,000 first-prize money. ==Finals== ===Singles=== Rita Grande defeated Antonella Serra Zanetti 6–2, 4–6, 6–1 * It was Grande's 1st singles title of her the year and the 3rd of her career. ===Doubles=== Gisela Dulko / María Emilia Salerni defeated Henrieta Nagyová / Elena Tatarkova 6–3, 6–4 ==External links== * ITF tournament edition details * Tournament draws Grand Prix Sar La Princesse Lalla Meryem Category:Morocco Open Category:2003 in Moroccan sport
title: 2003 Grand Prix SAR La Princesse Lalla Meryem
